title.narrative: Procurement of Services to Provide Support - School Sector Reform Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Services to Provide Support - School Sector Reform Programme) is a component of School Sector Reform Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £853,217. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Primary education, Basic life skills for youth and adults, Early childhood education, Secondary education, Vocational training. , with the following implementing partners: Ecorys, Ernst & Young, Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 02-04-2009 and the end date is 15-07-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic life skills for youth and adults

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - advanced technical and managerial training
